com.test.automation.framework.keywordmodel.keywords

Class KeywordBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.test.automation.framework.keywordmodel.keywords.KeywordBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IKeyword

    public abstract class KeywordBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements IKeyword
    Base keyword class that implements the IKeyword interface. This class provides utility to execute the keywords using the Java reflection api.

    Extend this class if you want your methods to be used as keywords.

    Author:
    Varun Menon

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        protected void initialize(java.lang.Object obj)
        Initializes the class to collect the information of the methods available in the said class. Use this method if you want to initialize methods from some other class object.
        Parameters:
        obj - Object of the class whose method you to use for keyword execution.

      • isSupported

        public boolean isSupported(java.lang.String methodName,
                  java.lang.Object[] args)
        Description copied from interface: IKeyword
        Verifies whether the said keyword with the arguments is supported by the implementing class or not.
        Specified by:
        isSupported in interface IKeyword
        Parameters:
        methodName - Keyword that needs to be executed
        args - Arguments that needs to be used to execute the said keyword
        Returns:
        true or false depending upon the condition whether the "keyword" with specified no. of arguments is supported or not.

        args - Arguments to be used for the keyword execution.
